text: Mario Eggimann (born 24 January 1981) is a former Swiss football player. He played as a defender. He has played for FC Aarau, Karlsruher SC, Hannover 96, Union Berlin, and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:2010 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Aargau
title: Mario Eggimann
